H0.text: Large mice will eat more food than smaller mice is an example of a hypothesis.

H1.text: One flower was measured to be 13 centimeters tall is an example of a hypothesis involving the measurement of a flower's height.

H2.text: On a dark night, a student counted hundreds of stars is an example of a hypothesis.

H3.text: People should be careful to protect endangered animals is an example of a hypothesis.

A4.text: A hypothesis is a suggested explanation of a phenomenon, or alternately a reasoned proposal suggesting a possible correlation between or among a set of phenomena.
